resources.string:
TIME ZONE
> Seoul in Korea : 9
> St.John's in Canana : -2.5
>Los Angeles in US : -7

RENAME or COPY
If this switch is ON, vmate source files will be renamed with new name

If this switch OFF, files will be copied into DCIM folder
DELETE AFTER COPY\nIf this switch is ON, vmate source files will be deleted one by one just after copying into destination folder\nRemember you should have enough storage if you do not delete
